channel.title: art on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in art on Barefoot Rob

item.title: made pottery
item.description: 11:04 Saturday 19 August 2017 JST We just made some pottery with an chill old man sensei. I made a mobius strip for Fred, an upside-down plate for me, a dice shaker and two dice for my students.

item.title: poem on Reddit
item.description:
14:25 Thursday 01 June 2017 JST https://www.reddit.com/r/FoundPaper/comments/6ej5ia/purchased_old_poetry_book_at_flea_market_and/dib0tzl/
poetry receipt saved in book one hundred years says temporary

item.title: art
item.description: 17:38 Saturday 31 December 2016 JST I scanned and uploaded Niigata Set 2016

item.title: Lin's Heart
item.description: 12:34 Friday 23 December 2016 JST Lin and I just completed a small piece of art I titled Lin’s Heart because it started with a heart shape which she drew in light blue. We took turns drawing on it. It’s not exactly an exquisite corpse, because she chose the colors each time we drew on it, and we each only drew with one color at each swap. I kinda want to make an art website; maybe I should re-start uploading to Tumblr, Canvas, and then post items for sale on the bitcoin one.

item.title: art in the park
item.description: 16:11 Wednesday 22 June 2016 JST Sat in the park and worked on the drawing which Yoko started. I had drawn some yellow drops around her green Vs and one of the yellow drops was all lopsided so I was like “bluh” and stopped drawing for a while. Like for over a month while we were busy with moving etc, and I just didn’t do anything on those pieces started by the GG class.

item.title: creativity
item.description: 17:00 Tuesday 21 June 2016 JST Yesterday I taught three lessons down near Minami Machida. The third was with a student who creates music. He said he likes my art, and I talked about how it’s the quantity we need to worry about instead of the quality. You take care of the quantity. I'll take care of the quality. - God I think that’s from The Artists Way.

item.title: stARTed
item.description: 19:03 Friday 11 March 2016 JST In the GG class, I had each student start a new piece of art. The rules were to choose only one color and draw whatever they like on one paperboard thing.

item.title: endless
item.description: 23:31 Monday 03 March 2016 JST

item.title: Finished Busy Road
item.description:
15:04 Saturday 20 February 2016 JST This was Busy Road as of Dec 2015:
I’m declaring it finished now; I can’t see what else to add to it!

item.title: recent art
item.description: 10:20 Thursday 11 February 2016 JST I worked on art recently while sitting in the donut shop at bottm of Atre in JR Kawasaki station.

item.title: updates to Three or more circles
item.description: 14:32 Saturday 19 December 2015 JST

item.title: Nearly finished White Dots
item.description: 16:18 Wednesday 16 December 2015 JST Today I created a post for White Dots on Patreon. I’m not sure if the piece is finished, but it’s close! Today I added tiny dots around the white dots (and other colors), added the squiggly yellow line that ended up being shaped something like the kanji for mountain: å±±, and drew straight-ish lines under the yellow squiggle and under its kanji.

item.title: Uploaded pics of some drawings
item.description: 20:49 Sunday 13 December 2015 JST White Dots Busy Ring three or more circles One Teleport Maze Summer Vacation: Here’s the front:

item.title: White Dots 2015
item.description: 17:32 Thursday 19 November 2015 JST Nice. I’m chillin’ at a conveni near my lesson in Akihabara. I brought a new (small) shikishi to start a new drawing. However, when I pulled it out of my bag, I realized they only markers I have are Posca, which I sorta kinda don’t always like. I like the ink, but the nibs on these particular pens seems scratchy and don’t always draw nice lines.

item.title: finished Summer Vacation
item.description:
7:43 Thursday 19 November 2015 JST Yay! I finished Summer Vacation this morning! Accept no imitations! (heehee) Here’s the back of Summer Vacation:
Here’s the front:

item.title: Scanning Busy Ring
item.description: 10:02 Tuesday 03 November 2015 JST I just finished Busy Ring last night. It’s got a donut shaped area of black lines which gave it its name. Permalink https://art.robnugen.com/br

item.title: Summer Vacation was named by Sampei
item.description: 17:48 Thursday 29 October 2015 JST In this morning’s lesson, Sampei named my latest drawing “Summer Vacation” after I asked him for a suggestion. I loved it, and immediately wrote the name on the back, plus “(named by Sampei)” though I forgot to put the date that he named it. So here it is, in my journal. I worked on the piece a bit more, actually encompassing one of the baseball looking shapes in the background colors.

item.title: art
item.description: 21:51 Tuesday 27 October 2015 JST Starting now I work on my art each day in the morning. Nice.

item.title: One Teleport Maze
item.description: 18:19 Tuesday 29 September 2015 JST Yoshie canceled her lesson today, so I decided to work on a maze instead. I’m starting with a piece I had started already. 19:36 Tuesday 29 September 2015 JST I just finished a piece I’ve titled “One Teleport Maze” because, if it’s a maze, and if the start and end points are the bulbous areas in opposite corners, and if the dots are teleports, and if the paths are either the black paths or the swirly paths, I can solve it by using a single teleport.

item.title: Underlined
item.description: ##20:25 Saturday 10 January 2015 JST## I just finished a new piece I’ve called “Underlined”, which features ink on paperboard (è²ç´). I started it a few days ago by drawing some shapes without my glasses. I didn’t take a picture of them before drawing other lines, but they’re still visible, due to my policy of not overlaying colors. I might upload an image of it here, but for now, it’s visible at its shortlink: https://art.

item.title: sold a design!!
item.description: ##21:35 Wednesday 24 December 2014 JST## Fantastic! Mutsumi’s friend like the pieces I made and paid me 5000 yen for them. Woohoo!

item.title: Great great great sales day!
item.description: ##17:00 Tuesday 16 December 2014 JST## Yay!! I showed my designs to Funatsu-san; she selected four designs she likes. ##20:19 Tuesday 16 December 2014 JST## Yay!! I just spoke with Mutsumi’s mom; she would like to use some of my designs on her blouses!

item.title: Nine panel maze
item.description:
16:09 Monday 15 December 2014 JST Actually, it’s not really a maze; there are no dead ends except for the start and finish points. It’s actually a puzzle to figure out how to connect the start and end points. Anyway, After about 4 hours of work, I’ve finished the final draft:
Now I just need to draw all the black lines on the actual panels. Shortlink for this piece https://art.

item.title: Nine panel maze
item.description:
##03:38 Monday 15 December 2014 JST## Over the weekend I worked on expanding the four pieces to a larger project. At this point it looks like this:
I haven’t got the maze planned exactly, but I want to draw a maze that spans the panels. The points at which the maze goes off the edge of panels will be aligned in a way that the panels seem to fit together in multiple ways.

item.title: made some new art pieces
item.description: ##01:27 Saturday 13 December 2014 JST## I’m not sure what to call them; they’re not really drawings, nor are they paintings.. They’ll eventually be pieces of a maze puzzle thing. I’ll draw a maze or two behind them; I drew some dots on the edges where the maze paths would cross over the different panels, but I made a mistake that will require drawing some more pieces. Maybe it was intentional so I wouldn’t have 4 pieces as a set, because four is unlucky in Japan.

item.title: Fantastic Mutsumi!!
item.description: ##22:38 Tuesday 09 December 2014 JST## Wow wow wow wow so great and so thankful for Mutsumi helping me so much with my art! She introduced me to the owner of company who deals in fashion designs. Word; I can dig my designs on some shirts! She asked if I can tweak my design a bit, but it’s not even really a tweak so much as just use a fatter marker.

item.title: prepping to meet Mutsumi's friend
item.description: ##12:11 Friday 05 December 2014 JST## Mutsumi has set up a meeting with her friend who buys and sells designs. I like to make designs, so it’s a match made in heaven!

item.title: sigh oh sigh frame by frame
item.description: ##22:34 Sunday 05 May 2013 7:55pm Sunday 5 May 2013 Today I went to Yodobashi Camera to buy a camera, but I wanted to confirm that it would work with my computer before purchase. They didn’t seem to have any web cameras out of their boxes, so I figured I wouldn’t be able to test one before buying. Rather than try banging my proverbial head against the unbendable rules, I went to Bic Camera to see if they had cameras I could use.

item.title: my floating virtual lego blocks
item.description: ##18:52 Sunday 24 March 2013 6:44pm Sunday 24 March 2013 After reading on HN that Google has discontinued Blocked Sites, I was browsing through the extensions available for Chrome, and found Build With Chrome. My creation hasn’t been approved yet, but it’s apparently visible if you click Rob’s floating v-shaped Lego thing. It looks something like this

item.title: Five stars on drawquest
item.description: ##23:39 Sunday 10 February 2013 Though I spent a lot less time on it, five people gave me stars on my DrawQuest drawing

item.title: killer snowman on DrawQuest
item.description: ##12:57 Sunday 10 February 2013 I just thought of a new idea for DrawQuest. I can’t show the full animation here, but if you have an iPad, download the app, and find me (thunderrabbit), you can see it. I drew a snowman who then thought about killing his maker, but then the dog barked and the snowman reverted to his normal happy state. This works easily because the eraser too erases down to the original image, not down to the blank canvas.

item.title: making secret Christmas presents!
item.description:
##22:40 Tuesday 11 December 2012 Not so secret if I post online, but still
Fun times!

item.title: Hand-painted palm-sized elephant
item.description: ##12:20 Sunday 18 November 2007 Animals painted on hands Originally uploaded by thunderrabbit This is my favorite of several images that my mom emailed me and I posted on flickr

item.title: new Castle of Dreams map
item.description: ##23:39 Thursday 08 November 2007 new Castle of Dreams mapOriginally uploaded by thunderrabbit I sketched this map at work as I was planning to make a [navigation /] extension for MediaWiki that would allow me to make a “map” out of a wiki
